shortDescription.value: 4 Burgers, 6 Nuggets, 1 Regular Popcorn Chicken, 2 Large Chips and 1 Dipping Sauce.

longDescription.value: This feast is big and burgerful. Stuffed with two Original Crispy Burgers, two Zinger® Burgers, 6 golden Nuggets, 1 Regular Popcorn Chicken®, 2 Large Chips and 1 Dipping Sauce, this feast is bound to go down a treat with everyone. Only in SA and not forever.
